doc.author: liangwei
doc.description: 主要厂家设备故障数据月报

sql.name: factories_device_faultData_monthly_reportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: factories_device_faultData_monthly_report.group
factories_device_faultData_monthly_report.coltitle
sql.item: select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('华为') from dual union all select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('中兴') from dual union all select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('烽火') from sql.name: factories_device_faultData_monthly_report.centervalue
sql.item: select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('华为'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('中兴'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('烽火'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('朗讯'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct trim('SDH设备次')||'.'||trim('北电'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000017),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select distinct
